syntax:
data list a =
  | Cons { head: a; tail: list a }
  | Nil
abstract int
fact duplicable int

val (+) (x: int, y: int): int = fail

val rec length [a] (l: list a): int =
  match explain l with
  | Nil ->
      0
  | Cons { tail } ->
      1 + length tail
  end

val zero = length Nil
